no_more_50_words: Kissing is a sign of showing affection, commonly used among lovers.
150_to_200_words: If lovers want to show affection, they usually kiss each other. This is a common form of physical contact that expresses love, affection and intimacy, and it can be used to show appreciation and admiration. Kissing is a way for lovers to express their feelings to each other without using words. It is a way for them to connect and share a special moment that only the two of them can understand and appreciate. Kissing can be a gentle and tender gesture or a passionate and ecstatic experience depending on what the couple wants to convey. It is a way for them to show their desire for each other and to reaffirm their commitment to each other. Kissing is a very special act of love and is one of the most romantic things that two people can do together. It is a way for lovers to show their love and devotion, and it can be a powerful way to express their emotions for one another.
